element.name: filePath
element.selector: div.fieldset-wrapper:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > fieldset:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(2) > input:nth-child(1)

element.name: configurableColumnId

element.name: importSource
element.selector: div.fieldset-wrapper:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > fieldset:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > select

element.name: urlPath
